meanings.def: the act of joining two or more organizations or businesses into one
examples: If the merger goes through, thousands of jobs will be lost.
merger between/of A and B a merger between the two banks
merger with something our proposed merger with the university
There are local companies ripe for merger or acquisition.
There has been a flurry of corporate mergers and acquisitions.
They completed a merger with Monsanto.
They threatened legal action to block the merger.
